name: Millimetric.ai
description:
At Millimetric, we’re revolutionising the way global organisations analyse their most mission-critical business insights. Even the smallest metrics can make the biggest difference in what is becoming an increasingly digital world and so we’ve built a ground-breaking tool that analyses business data around the clock and spots anomalies in business performance the second they occur. We like to think of it as supercharging E-Commerce Technology and Martech by helping them to do a thorough job, at speed and hassle-free!

Now a little about our success so far. We’ve had investment from Global Founders Capital, who have backed the likes of Revolut, Hello Fresh and Skyscanner, as well as investment from Seedcamp who get behind world class entrepreneurs. Our clients include Clinique, Mac, Domino’s, Samsung and Toyota, just to name a few and our customer base is growing daily, hence why we’re on the hunt for fresh new talent to join our already established team.

team.name: Alexandra Williams
team.bioHtml: Headed up a Strategy and Transformation Recruitment team for 6 years and now moved to Talent Acquisition to help Millimetric build out their teams internally

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description:
We’re searching for a data superstar to join the team here, someone who can continually push the boundaries of the results our customers can achieve here with time-series and anomaly detection. The perfect candidate will able to demonstrate the highest level of numeracy, statistical analysis, critical thinking and problem-solving skills to interpret  large amounts of data from different sources, and of course a passion for machine-learning and research is a must! You’ll be working with our back-end developers to implement suitable methodologies in a rapidly growing platform designed for broad adoption, to provide insights that will transform our customers businesses. We want to work with someone who is always curious and has willingness to learn new skills.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Collaborate with tech team to deliver the business critical algorithms that power our automated business analysis platform
• Be instrumental in us advancing our time series understanding models, and improving the quality of the insights provided to our customers
• Work on a variety of different data challenges across our product e.g. modelling, evaluation, machine learning, analytics)
• Design, implement, and launch your own experiments, data products and features
• Liaise with internal stakeholders to translate business needs into technical

skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Python, Perl, R
Machine Learning Data Science Python R

jobs.title: Senior Software Developer
jobs.description:
About the Role
We’re on the hunt for a multi-talented Developer to take a lead role in our growing technical team to deliver scalable software solutions. Key to this post will be your ability and experience with both front-end and back-end coding languages, in order to continually develop and improve the product in line with clients and customer requirements. The team here is small and multifunctional, so we need someone who can approach software holistically; a pragmatist who is able to consider both the user experience of our platform as well as the functionality. The candidate who joins the team will have a large amount of autonomy and have a crucial role in devising and spearheading new ideas, thinking strategically about the development of the product and it’s next iteration (which we think is quite exciting!). As ever, we want an expert, someone who would consider themselves the ‘go-to’ for any technical problems and solutions. 

RESPONSIBILITIES 
• Collaborate with the wider development & data science team and Product Managers to produce scalable software solutions with our customers requirements at the forefront of change 
• Mainly focus on both client-facing side, but also have some hand in the server-side architecture
• Build the frontend of applications, delivering high-quality mock-ups designing different prototypes, all using high-quality graphics and engaging visual elements
• Continually testing software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency, as well as troubleshooting, debugging and upgrading software
• Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
• Write effective supporting technical documentation
• Use a variety of programming languages in order to create user-friendly web pages
• Optimize web and mobile applications for maximum speed and use

jobs.title: Front-end Developer
jobs.description:
Our growing tech team here are looking for a strong Front-end Developer to coordinate with the wider team to improve and grow our exciting product, along with various interactive designs. As you'll be acting in a small, agile team, you will have an important strategic role, taking on a lot of responsibility and autonomy in order to develop our product to its next iteration.

RESPONSIBILITIES 
• Understanding client’s needs to develop a high-end website
• Direct responsibility for implementation of front-end
• Implementation with fast and agile deployment processes 

REQUIRED
•  Proven skills in developing Web-Front-ends with HTML, (S)CSS and Bootstrap
• Commitment to build an application with attention to clean, well-tested code
• Strong knowledge in Javascript (ES6), JQuery and JSON, REST, npm and Git
• 3+ years front-end designing and implementing web-based applications experiences 
• Ability to write responsive and reusable codes for UI components
• Advanced knowledge about development of highly performant SAAS websites
• Experience with Project Collaboration Tools (e.g. Jira)
• Communication in English 

DESIRABLE
• React or AngularJS, VueJS (or similar frameworks) and the concepts behind it
• Bachelor’s degree in related field and/or demonstrated applicable work experience
